title: Savage iron
creator_credit: Department of Film Production and Don Anderson
brief_description: Development of the iron ore at Savage River, north-western Tasmania, including construction of a new town, mill, ore slurry pipeline, pelletising plant at Port Latta and offshore loading facilities. Briefly shows the Yawata steel works near Osaka Japan, where the ore is processed.
